thread.title: Liberty Media - ‍To Offer $400 Million Of Senior Debentures Exchangeable For Sirius Xm Common Stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Liberty Media - ‍To Offer $400 Million Of Senior Debentures Exchangeable For Sirius Xm Common Stock
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Liberty Media Corp:
* LIBERTY MEDIA - ‍ INTENDS TO OFFER $400 MILLION PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR DEBENTURES EXCHANGEABLE FOR SIRIUS XM HOLDINGS COMMON STOCK IN PRIVATE OFFERING​
* LIBERTY MEDIA - TO USE NET PROCEEDS OF OFFERING TO REPURCHASE SHARES OF LIBERTY SIRIUSXM COMMON STOCK, TO MAKE POSSIBLE ACQUISITIONS AND INVESTMENTS
* LIBERTY MEDIA - ‍ OR COULD OFFER UP TO $460 MILLION OF SENIOR DEBENTURES IF INITIAL PURCHASERS EXERCISE OPTION TO PURCHASE ADDITIONAL DEBENTURES IN FULL​ (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
